summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VOOADA Electric for Face, Arm, Waist, Belly, Leg, Hip
Review Date: 2020/08/07
Store: VOOADA
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.87 x 2.05 inches; 1.37 Pounds', 'UPC': '699936288523'}
Review Text: Love this drill! It works great and it’s super easy to use for beginners.
Review Title: Beginner friendly, and easy to use.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SYbeauty Pre Stretched Braiding Hair Extensions 26 Inch 10 Packs/Lot Synthetic Kanekalon Ombre Braiding Hair Professional Soft Yaki Texture Natural Easy Braid Crochet Hair (26", 1B)
Review Date: 2020/08/20
Store: SYbeauty
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SYbeauty', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Style': 'Braiding Hair Pre Stretched', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '15.2 x 10.91 x 2.56 inches; 1.47 Pounds', 'UPC': '190372769442'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c0aae0fa87abeb3d72ce48235a63c3ac]] I am amazed with the quality of this hair. the fibers is premium quality; it doesn’t tangle (unless you’re like me and keep restarting a braid.) and it’s super silky and smooth whilst braiding. Doesn’t burn your fingers! Nice quality product! The hair also super flowly, it has a lot of movement before dipping.
Review Title: Highly recommend!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JARGOD 1pcs 100% Kolinsky Sable Acrylic Nails Round Nail Art Brush (size 4)
Review Date: 2020/08/21
Store: JARGOD
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JARGOD', 'Handle Material': 'Acrylic', 'Head Material': 'Kolinsky', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 0.3 x 0.3 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: This brush is perfect. I did a full overlay Acrylic set and they were perfect. Although I prefer this particular brush for nail due the smaller size. It still works great for doing artificial nail sets.
Review Title: Great brush! It’s a small size.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz.
Review Date: 2020/08/25
Store: C'est Moi
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'}
Review Text: Super nice! Easy to use and removes makeup efficiently. Just put a little on a cotton ball and wipes right off. I used this for my eyeshadow, liner and mascara. Does the job! And I have sensitive skin and this has not caused any problems!
Review Title: Gets the job done!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Pack Spray Bottles,Empty Plastic Clear Small Transparent Travel Bottles Pump Bottle Lotion Dispenser Bottle Set,Refillable Liquid Containers 3oz and 2 oz
Review Date: 2020/09/13
Store: Cehomi
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.14 x 1.1 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: Nice travel size spray bottles and pumps! Perfect for hand sanitizers or just water spray bottles. The pumps and spray bottles work as expected and it’s a value kit, so 3 of each!
Review Title: 6 pieces, works as expected and travel size.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre Red Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women
Review Date: 2020/11/11
Store: Altaba
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Altaba'}
Review Text: This is a cute wig for a quick style change! It doesn’t look super realistic, but I wore it with a hat which made it perfect for my outfit! I wouldn’t recommend it for daily wear, but definitely for cosplay, a photoshoot, or a outfit with a stylish hat!
Review Title: Cute for a style change! Not a realistic wig.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Packs Wig Stand Holder,Portable Wig Hanger for All Wigs Long and Short Hair and Hats,Durable Collapsible Travel Wig Stands Display Tool Dryer Holder(3 Pack, Pink)
Review Date: 2020/11/14
Store: MarchQueen
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.64 x 7.87 x 2.6 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841565'}
Review Text: the idea of these are really nice. it’s just a little flimsy and the directions are all in mandarin or something, so putting them together was really a chore. once they are put together properly it does hold up wigs and creates more space, just the durability of them is a concern.
Review Title: nice concept, a little flimsy
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EEWIGS Ombre Green Synthetic 13×4 Lace Front Wigs short Bob Straight wig Heat Resistant cosplay wigs with pre plucked for women
Review Date: 2021/02/03
Store: EEWIGS
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'EEWIGS', 'Package Dimensions': '10.08 x 8.94 x 3.54 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: This wig is super cute! i love the full lace front versatility and it doesn’t tangle for it be synthetic. super easy to style!! doesn’t look cheap! highly recommend for a quick change.
Review Title: so many compliments! vibrant color!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Long Black Wavy Wig with Bangs for Women Synthetic Wigs Natural Looking Realistic Wigs Hair for Daily Party Cosplay Use
Review Date: 2021/03/08
Store: HNYBEE
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '24 x 6.3 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'HNYBEE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '24 x 6.3 x 1.57 inches; 14.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '723509998806'}
Review Text: beautifully packaged, it’s super soft and doesn’t look cheap! perfect for quick style change!
Review Title: long, soft, & nice quality!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz)
Review Date: 2021/04/24
Store: Argan Magic
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'}
Review Text: my hair feels soft and moistures after using this. if recommend allowing it to condition for approximately 30 mins then rinsing with cool water to get maximum results! my color didn’t fade! still vibrant!
Review Title: smells good and makes hair feel great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 21AE Silky Straight Lace Front Wigs with Baby Hair Pre plucked Frontal 22 Inch Synthetic Wigs for Black Women Heat Resistant Fiber Wigs Middle Parting Natural Color Wig
Review Date: 2021/06/12
Store: 21AE
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 7.28 x 2.8 inches; 11.82 Ounces'}
Review Text: The quality of this hair really nice for it be synthetic. It's not super shiny & it does look really good! I'm impressed with how it doesn't tangle a lot also! The lace looks realistic and it comes pre-plucked! Great for a beginner!
Review Title: Good quality hair!!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lace Front Wigs Straight Human Hair Silk Base Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women 10A Brazilian Remy Virgin Human Hair Wigs Natural Black Color 16 Inch
Review Date: 2021/07/09
Store: Rebasar
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Rebasar', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.22 x 8.5 x 2.36 inches; 11.68 Ounces'}
Review Text: this hair is very nice! it’s soft and doesn’t tangle at all! (i haven’t colored it or done anything to it)  it is a silk closure wig, so it’s way different than a lace closure.
Review Title: silk closure wig
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Urrtreusor Pixie Layered Short Grey Wigs for White Women Ombre Blonde Natural Wave Synthetic Full Old Lady Wig Old Middle Age Women Office Lady Mixed Brown Highlight Wig
Review Date: 2022/01/07
Store: Urrtreusor
Average Rating: 2.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'Urrtreusor', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 6.81 x 2.32 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'A40-SWI00691-107'}
Review Text: This is perfect for a elderly person who wants a style change! The color is beautiful and it’s easy to style with wig spray.
Review Title: has a lot of volume, easy to style!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Purchaser Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Beauty and Personal Care:** High interest in cosmetics and skincare products. Frequent purchases reflect a need for beginner-friendly tools, effective makeup removers, and nourishing treatments for hair.

- **Wigs and Hair Accessories:** Regular investment in a variety of wigs, including synthetic and human hair options, suggests a trend towards experimenting with styles and colors for different occasions, such as cosplay and casual wear.

- **Quality and Functionality:** Preference for products that showcase good quality, ease of use, and positive performance. Reviews consistently highlight the importance of ease when handling products like hair extensions and tools.

- **Travel Convenience:** Interest in portable and travel-ready items, such as refillable spray bottles, indicates a lifestyle that values efficiency and organization on the go.

- **User-Friendly and Beginner-Friendly Products:** A tendency to favor items that simplify the beauty routine, indicating that the purchaser may be relatively new to certain beauty practices or prefers straightforward solutions.

- **Color and Style Variety:** Engagement with vibrant colors and unique styles in hair products reveals a desire for self-expression and creativity in appearance.

- **Natural and Safe Ingredients:** Positive reception towards products that are vegan, cruelty-free, or without harsh chemicals suggests a growing awareness of ethical and health-conscious choices in beauty.

target_interaction.title: Nice roll on brush eyeliner, but i feel like it's a bit overpriced
target_interaction.text: I like how there's two options with the felt tip, and the more sharp tip for a more precise line. However, it's not as bold as I would like, I was expecting it to be like a liquid pen that rolls on with a heavier hue, I like how it glides on but I just wish It was more pigmented.
